mapper.select: select * from ep_recruit order by ep_board DESC;

select distinct er.ep_board, er.ep_id, er.title, er.stack, er.showing_period, er.recruit, er.gender, er.payment, er.work_day_start, er.work_day_end, er.addr, er.detail, er.create_date, er.update_date, er.file_attached from ep_recruit as er inner join ep_recruit_stack as ers on er.ep_board = ers.ep_board where er.title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') order by er.ep_board DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ep_recruit(title, ep_id, stack, showing_period, recruit, gender, payment, work_day_start, work_day_end, addr, detail, create_date, update_date, file_attached) VALUES (#{title}, #{epId}, #{stack}, #{showingPeriod}, #{recruit}, #{gender}, #{payment}, #{workDayStart}, #{workDayEnd}, #{addr}, #{detail}, now(), now(), #{fileAttached} );
mapper.select: SELECT distinct e.name FROM fc.ep as e inner join fc.ep_recruit as er on e.ep_id = er.ep_id where er.ep_board = #{epBoard};
select * from ep_recruit er left join ep_recruit_mainthumbnail erm on er.ep_board = erm.ep_recruit_board order by ep_board DESC;;
mapper.update: UPDATE ep_recruit SET ep_id = #{epId}, title = #{title}, stack = #{stack}, recruit = #{recruit}, gender = #{gender}, payment = #{payment}, showing_period = #{showingPeriod}, work_Day_Start = #{workDayStart}, work_Day_End = #{workDayEnd}, addr = #{addr}, detail = #{detail}, update_date = now() WHERE ep_board = #{epBoard};
